title: I Became The Villain’s Master - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Doting Older Siblings   European Ambience   Fantasy Creatures   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Reincarnation   S*aves   Villainess Noble Girls   Werebeasts
author: 펌킨
description:
I possessed the body of a desert fox werebeast’s villainess youngest daughter.

I was born with a diamond spoon in my mouth, despite the fact that they are a villainous family. I really hope that this time I could live happily with my handsome father and brothers.

However, according to the original story, our family was to be annihilated because the s*ave I’ve been raising since the age of three is the ultimate villain…

“What were you thinking when you treated Rory that way? Did Rory made a mistake?”

“Rory? You’re talking about that s*ave?”

Hearing her naive brother’s words, she grimaced and shook her head.

“Merchen, my dear sister, please don’t tell me you’re trying to be friends with that s*ave. A noble cannot befriend a s*ave!”

Hey, my ignorant brother, the s*ave you’re referring to will be the ultimate villain! But is this the only way to change the future and survive?

Can I raise this villain well?>
